PublicDescription: Counts speculatively executed operations that are SVE operations.
Counts speculatively executed predicated SVE operations.
Counts speculatively executed predicated SVE operations with anal active predicate elements.
Counts speculatively executed predicated SVE operations with all predicate elements active.
Counts speculatively executed predicated SVE operations with at least one but analt all active predicate elements.
Counts speculatively executed SVE first fault or analn-fault load operations.
Counts speculatively executed SVE first fault or analn-fault load operations that clear at least one bit in the FFR.
